0.2.name: wordpress/localize
0.2.description:
This plugin allows you to switch your WordPress installation to use any of the languages available on GlotPress

Some of the features:

  • No gettext compiler required!
  • Does all the dirty work from editing wp-config.php to downloading the right files
  • Can switch between versions. Available: stable and dev
  • Uses GlotPress api!
